titles.title: Addiction Treatment Quality Improvement Act of 2018
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to improve quality measurement and development.
Addiction Treatment Quality Improvement Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Addiction Treatment Quality Improvement Act of 2018
This bill requires the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services to assess the status of Medicare quality measures regarding opioid- and substance-use disorders and to develop a plan to address any gaps.
